content.query:
DROP EXTERNAL TABLE [dbo].[CloudSales_Address]
GO

SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE [dbo].[CloudSales_Address]
( 
	[AddressID] [varchar](500)  NULL,
	[CustomerID] [varchar](500)  NULL,
	[AddressLine1] [varchar](500)  NULL,
	[AddressLine2] [varchar](500)  NULL,
	[City] [varchar](500)  NULL,
	[State] [varchar](500)  NULL,
	[ZipCode] [varchar](500)  NULL,
	[CreatedDate] [varchar](500)  NULL,
	[UpdatedDate] [varchar](500)  NULL
)
WITH (DATA_SOURCE = [AzureDataLakeStoreNew], LOCATION = N'/Raw/CloudSales_Raw/dboAddresses', FILE_FORMAT = [csv_delimitedNew], 
REJECT_TYPE = VALUE, REJECT_VALUE = 0 )
GO
